messages.message: fixed a bug in sync where book name/total wouldn't update in the db when changed; some minor style changes

added sync functions to API for book entry and wordcount entry. Also added a really cool chart to the View Entries page to show progress over time though it doesn't account for breaks between entries.
added sync functions to API on login and newAccount
added a 'settings' page, though none of it works yet. Also created the DB and create Account functions in the API, as well as the login and log out functions
I think I've got everything working for single device/localStorage.  None of the cross-device/account stuff works yet though.
